name: BlockGame
description: BlockGame is a puzzle/platformer hybrid where you control a character stuck in a realm of falling blocks. You must pick up and throw blocks to match them, gain points, and survive for as long as you can.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Storage: 200 MB available space
